update.description:
Ported @michael_deleo 's box region model plugin (pull request #1822) to default branch

accompanying gazebo_models [pull request #161](#!/osrf/gazebo_models/pull-requests/161/region-event-box/diff)

to check:

* insert the box region model into the world 

* open topic visualization window and subscribe to /gazebo/sim_events

* move any model into and out of the region and see messages published to the topic
update.title: Add box region event model plugin
